languages.text: "Сделайте из этого ничтожества показательный пример. Освежевать живьем публично, останки повесить напротив дома его семьи в назидание. Если кто-то попробует их убрать — расстрел на месте".

traits.locale_text: "Сделайте из этого ничтожества показательный пример. Освежевать живьем публично, останки повесить напротив дома его семьи в назидание. Если кто-то попробует их убрать — расстрел на месте".

languages.text: "Make an example of this scum. Publicly flay him and string up his corpse outside his family home as a warning. If anyone tries to remove it — shoot them."
languages.original_text: "Сделайте из этого ничтожества показательный пример. Освежевать живьем публично, останки повесить напротив дома его семьи в назидание. Если кто-то попробует их убрать — расстрел на месте".

traits.locale_text: "Make an example of this scum. Publicly flay him and string up his corpse outside his family home as a warning. If anyone tries to remove it — shoot them."
"Make an example of this scum. Publicly flay him and string up his corpse outside his family home as a warning. If anyone tries to remove it — shoot them."
"Make an example of this scum. Publicly flay him and string up his corpse outside his family home as a warning. If anyone tries to remove it — shoot them."
"Make an example of this scum. Publicly flay him and string up his corpse outside his family home as a warning. If anyone tries to remove it — shoot them."

languages.text: 「ゴミくずを見せしめにせよ。公衆の面前で鞭打ちに処し、死体を家族の家の外に吊して警告とする。下ろそうとする者があれば――誰であろうと撃て」
languages.original_text: "Make an example of this scum. Publicly flay him and string up his corpse outside his family home as a warning. If anyone tries to remove it — shoot them."

traits.locale_text: 「ゴミくずを見せしめにせよ。公衆の面前で鞭打ちに処し、死体を家族の家の外に吊して警告とする。下ろそうとする者があれば――誰であろうと撃て」

languages.text: “杀一儆百。当众剥了他的皮，把他的尸体挂在他家门外，以儆效尤。如果有人打算拿走尸体，当场枪毙。”
languages.original_text: "Make an example of this scum. Publicly flay him and string up his corpse outside his family home as a warning. If anyone tries to remove it — shoot them."

traits.locale_text: “杀一儆百。当众剥了他的皮，把他的尸体挂在他家门外，以儆效尤。如果有人打算拿走尸体，当场枪毙。”

languages.text: «Que esta escoria sirva de ejemplo. Desuéllenlo delante de todo el mundo y cuelguen su cadáver en la casa de su familia como advertencia. Si alguien intenta quitarlo, dispárenle».
languages.original_text: "Make an example of this scum. Publicly flay him and string up his corpse outside his family home as a warning. If anyone tries to remove it — shoot them."

traits.locale_text: «Que esta escoria sirva de ejemplo. Desuéllenlo delante de todo el mundo y cuelguen su cadáver en la casa de su familia como advertencia. Si alguien intenta quitarlo, dispárenle».

languages.text: "Statuiert an diesem Abschaum ein Exempel. Schindet ihn öffentlich und hängt seine Leiche als Warnung vor das Haus seiner Familie. Sollte jemand sie entfernen wollen – erschießt ihn."
languages.original_text: "Make an example of this scum. Publicly flay him and string up his corpse outside his family home as a warning. If anyone tries to remove it — shoot them."

traits.locale_text: "Statuiert an diesem Abschaum ein Exempel. Schindet ihn öffentlich und hängt seine Leiche als Warnung vor das Haus seiner Familie. Sollte jemand sie entfernen wollen – erschießt ihn."

languages.text: « Faites de lui un exemple. Exécutez-le en public et pendez son cadavre devant la demeure de sa famille en signe d'avertissement. Et si quelqu'un tente de le décrocher, abattez-le. »
languages.original_text: "Make an example of this scum. Publicly flay him and string up his corpse outside his family home as a warning. If anyone tries to remove it — shoot them."

traits.locale_text: « Faites de lui un exemple. Exécutez-le en public et pendez son cadavre devant la demeure de sa famille en signe d'avertissement. Et si quelqu'un tente de le décrocher, abattez-le. »

languages.text: "Bu pislik, diğerlerine ibret olsun. Halkın huzurunda derisini yüzün, cesedini de uyarı niyetine ailesinin evinin önüne asın. İndirmeye çalışan olursa vurun."
languages.original_text: "Make an example of this scum. Publicly flay him and string up his corpse outside his family home as a warning. If anyone tries to remove it — shoot them."

traits.locale_text: "Bu pislik, diğerlerine ibret olsun. Halkın huzurunda derisini yüzün, cesedini de uyarı niyetine ailesinin evinin önüne asın. İndirmeye çalışan olursa vurun."
